mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opinions (userId, placeId, placeName, content, isPublic, likes, dislikes, createdAt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{placeId}, #{placeName}, #{content}, #{isPublic}, 0, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM opinions WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE opinions SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE opinionId = #{opinionId}
UPDATE opinions SET dislikes = dislikes + 1 WHERE opinionId = #{opinionId}
